options.name: Devout
options.description: You dedicate your channeling to a diety or entity that empowers your magic. You can only Cast Spells from the Abjuration and Divine Schools of Magic, however your Damage Bonus Modifiers are doubled on those Spells.

options.name: Crusader
options.description: Gain +1 Damage with Slashing and Crushing Weapons

options.name: Dedication of Faith
options.description: Your Melee Weapons deal 1d4 Divine Damage which increases to 1d8 at level 7 and 2d8 at level 11. Roll an additional Dice against Undead and Dark Creatures.

options.name: Reaction : Healing Words
options.description: You Channel a Touch Healing Spell that requires 1 Action to Heal a Creature within 6 Units if they are able to hear you.

options.name: Free Action : Turn the Unfaithful
options.description: When you deal Divine Damage to a Dark or Undead Creature, you force them to make a Resilience Check against half the total Damage taken after Mitigations, or they become Afraid of you.

options.name: Improved Healing and Shielding
options.description: Your Healing and Shielding Spells are improved by 1 Dice.
